message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I think we can both do better than a 50/50 split.  Let's start with 60/40 in my favor, but I'm open to negotiation.
60/40 is too skewed in your favor. I'm looking for a more balanced split.
I'm willing to meet you halfway between 50/50 and 60/40. Let's try 55/45.
